title: Glenn Gould on the record
creator_credit: Wolf Koenig, Roman Kroitor and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Follows celebrated Canadian concert pianist in New York kidding the taxi driver, bantering with sound engineers at Colombia Records, and then alone with the piano, fastidiously recording the Bach Italian concerto for a host of music lovers he will never see. Written by Stanley Jackson, photographed by Wolf Koenig.
